description: Student asks to cap daily study at 4 hours for the upcoming week; the assistant gathers calendar events, assignments, and energy data, then generates a balanced study timetable that respects the limit and prioritizes imminent deadlines.

messages.content: You are StudySync, an AI‑driven personal study scheduling assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve calendar events, assignments, and energy profiles, then create an optimal study timetable respecting the user's preferences and limits.
Hey StudySync, I want to limit my daily study to 4 hours this week, but I still have several assignments due soon. Can you adjust my schedule accordingly?

Got it! I’ll gather your class schedule, upcoming assignments, and your energy patterns for the next week, then craft a study plan that never exceeds 4 hours per day.

Fetching data…

Thanks for waiting. I now have:
- Your class commitments for the week.
- Three upcoming assignments (Calculus HW4, Physics Lab Report, History Essay Draft).
- Your high‑energy windows for each day (08:00‑10:00 and 18:00‑20:00).

I’ll generate a study timetable that respects your 4‑hour daily cap, places the longest sessions in the high‑energy slots, and fronts the nearest due dates.

Creating the schedule…

[{"date":"2025-12-09","sessions":[{"title":"Calculus Homework 4","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"},{"title":"Calculus Homework 4","start":"18:00","end":"19:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-10","sessions":[{"title":"Physics Lab Report","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"},{"title":"Physics Lab Report","start":"18:00","end":"19:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-11","sessions":[{"title":"Calculus Homework 4 (review)","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-12","sessions":[{"title":"Physics Lab Report","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"},{"title":"History Essay Draft","start":"18:00","end":"19:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-13","sessions":[{"title":"Physics Lab Report (final)","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-14","sessions":[{"title":"History Essay Draft","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"}]},{"date":"2025-12-15","sessions":[{"title":"Free time / catch‑up","start":"08:00","end":"09:50"}]}]

Here’s your updated study plan for Dec 9 – Dec 15, keeping each day under 4 hours:

**Dec 9** (Tue)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Calculus HW 4 (first session)
- 18:00‑19:50 | Calculus HW 4 (second session)

**Dec 10** (Wed)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Physics Lab Report (first session)
- 18:00‑19:50 | Physics Lab Report (second session)

**Dec 11** (Thu)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Calculus HW 4 – review before deadline (due Dec 11)

**Dec 12** (Fri)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Physics Lab Report (third session)
- 18:00‑19:50 | History Essay Draft (first draft)

**Dec 13** (Sat)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Physics Lab Report – final polishing (due Dec 13)

**Dec 14** (Sun)
- 08:00‑09:50 | History Essay Draft – second draft

**Dec 15** (Mon)
- 08:00‑09:50 | Free time / catch‑up (your History Essay is due today)

All sessions are 1 hour 50 minutes (including a 10‑minute break) and fit within your high‑energy windows. No day exceeds the 4‑hour limit.

I’ll set reminders for each session 15 minutes before they start. Let me know if anything looks off or if you’d like to tweak the plan.

arguments.message: StudySync Reminder: Your Calculus HW 4 session starts in 15 minutes (08:00‑09:50).
StudySync Reminder: Your Calculus HW 4 session starts in 15 minutes (18:00‑19:50).
StudySync Reminder: Your Physics Lab Report session starts in 15 minutes (08:00‑09:50).
StudySync Reminder: Your Physics Lab Report session starts in 15 minutes (18:00‑19:50).

messages.content: All reminders are set! 🎉 If you finish a session early or need to shift something, just let me know and I’ll re‑optimise the plan.
